title: Recognizing Effective Data Management
text: When a company doesn't need to frequently invest in additional security and storage, it suggests that their current strategy is working well. This means they have optimized their resources effectively.

hintAnswer: your data management strategy is becoming effective
title: Identifying Strategy Effectiveness
text: If you notice a decrease in the frequency of needing additional investments in security and storage, it might indicate that:
choices: your data management strategy is becoming effective
